author: adrianc
msg: Overhauled Mini-language <order-map-list>, <set-calendar>, <string-append>, <string-to-list>, <to-string> elements. Added a format attribute to the <set> element - to be used for type conversions. Also removed deprecated StringToField class.
The overhaul includes: removing unnecessary object creation, make the class thread-safe, add syntax validation, and misc code cleanups.
